description: Analyses of carbon fractions using the Ankom A2000 Fiber Analyzer.

elements.description: Identification number for the analysis, corresponding to a single batch of samples.
elements.label: Analysis ID

elements.description: A list of names of people responsible for running the analysis.
elements.label: Measured By

elements.description: Date at which the analysis started.
elements.label: Date Started

elements.description: Comments or notes about the analysis.
elements.label: Analysis Remarks
elements.pattern_description: No comma ',' or semi-colon ';' due to csv

elements.description: Bag identification number between 1 and 24.
elements.label: Bag Number

elements.description: Is the filter bag a blank or does it contain a sample?
elements.label: Sample Type

elements.description: Comments or notes about the sample.
elements.label: Sample Remarks
elements.pattern_description: No comma ',' or semi-colon ';' due to csv

elements.description: Weight (g) of the empty filter bag.
elements.label: Empty Bag Weight (g)

elements.description: Weight (g) of the sample alone, without the filter bag (i.e. tare bag before weighing sample).
elements.label: Sample Weight (g)

elements.description: Total weight (g) of the filter bag + the sample.
elements.label: Total Initial Weight (g)

elements.description: Weight (g) of the filter bag and its contents, after neutral detergent fiber (NDF) extraction.
elements.label: NDF Weight (g)

elements.description: Correction factor to take into account particle loss from sample bags (if factor >1) or filter bag degradation (if factor <1) during neutral detergent fiber (NDF) extraction.
elements.label: NDF Correction Factor

elements.description: Weight (g) of the filter bag and its contents, after acid detergent fiber (ADF) extraction.
elements.label: ADF Weight (g)

elements.description: Correction factor to take into account particle loss from sample bags (if factor >1) or filter bag degradation (if factor <1) during acid detergent fiber (ADF) extraction.
elements.label: ADF Correction Factor

elements.description: Weight (g) of the filter bag and its contents, after acid detergent lignin (ADL) extraction.
elements.label: ADL Weight (g)

elements.description: Correction factor to take into account particle loss from sample bags (if factor >1) or filter bag degradation (if factor <1) during acid detergent lignin (ADL) extraction.
elements.label: ADL Correction Factor

elements.description: Weight (g) of the empty crucible + lid.
elements.label: Empty Crucible Weight (g)

elements.description: Weight (g) of the empty crucible + lid + filter bag and its content.
elements.label: Crucible + ADL Weight (g)

elements.description: Weight (g) of the crucible + lid + ash from the filter bag and its contents after the ashing procedure.
elements.label: Crucible + Ash Weight (g)

elements.description: Weight (g) of the ash from the filter bag and its content after the ashing procedure.
elements.label: Ash Weight (g)

elements.description: Correction factor to take into account incomplete combustion of filter bag during the ashing procedure.
elements.label: Ashing Correction Factor

elements.description: Soluble cell contents (% of dry mass). Corresponds to carbohydrates, lipids, pectin, waxes, starch, soluble proteins, and non-protein nitrogen.
elements.label: Soluble Contents (%)

elements.description: Concentration of hemicellulose and bound proteins (% of dry mass).
elements.label: Hemicellulose (%)

elements.description: Concentration of cellulose (% of dry mass).
elements.label: Cellulose (%)

elements.description: Concentration of lignin (% of dry mass).
elements.label: Lignin (%)

elements.description: Concentration of recalcitrant inorganic materials (% of dry mass).
elements.label: Recalcitrants (%)

elements.description: Sum of all calculated carbon fractions (%).
elements.label: Sum of Fractions (%)

elements.description: Neutral detergent fiber (% of dry mass). Corresponds to hemicellulose and bound proteins + cellulose + lignin + recalcitrants.
elements.label: NDF (%)

elements.description: Acid detergent fiber (% of dry mass). Corresponds to cellulose + lignin + recalcitrants.
elements.label: ADF (%)

elements.description: Acid detergent lignin (% of dry mass). Corresponds to lignin + recalcitrants.
elements.label: ADL (%)
Test NDF Correction Factors_local

elements.description: A flag to identify a problem with the bag that make the data unusable (= Bad). Defaults to "Good", indicating that the data are usable.
elements.label: Quality Flag: Bag

elements.description: Brief explanation as to why the data are unusable.
elements.label: Quality Comments: Bag
elements.pattern_description: No comma ',' or semi-colon ';' due to csv

elements.label: NDF Correction Factors
ADF Correction Factors
ADL Correction Factors
Ashing Correction Factors

elements.description: Photos of the samples being analyzed.
elements.label: Sample Photos

elements.description: Photos of the lab notebooks (e.g., written notes and data).
elements.label: Lab Notebook Photos

elements.description: Audio comments about the analysis.
elements.label: Analysis Audio Remarks

name: Carbon Fractions

status_field.description: Status of record. Record first requires verification. Once verified, it can be submitted for approval; this locks the record for standard users. If approved, the record eventually gets published. If rejected, it goes back to standard users for further verification.
status_field.label: Record Status
